mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COACHES(UID, PROFILE_PHOTO, CAREER, IS_APPROVED) VALUES(#{uid}, #{profilePhoto}, #{career}, FALSE)
mapper.select: SELECT ID, UID, PROFILE_PHOTO, CAREER, IS_APPROVED FROM COACHES WHERE IS_APPROVED=FALSE
SELECT COACHES.ID, COACHES.UID, COACHES.PROFILE_PHOTO, COACHES.CAREER, COACHES.IS_APPROVED FROM USERS, COACHES WHERE USERS.ID = COACHES.UID AND USERS.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%')
